traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The krasis can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The krasis makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its claws, and one with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 27 (6d6 + 6 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
entries: Melee atk +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 33 (6d8 + 6 damage) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
